meanings.definition: Subjected to high heat in order to remove moisture or impurities.
meanings.sent1: The wood was torrified to make it stronger and more durable.
meanings.sent2: The chef torrified the spices to enhance their flavor in the dish.
meanings.sent3: The cookies were torrified in the oven, making them extra crispy and delicious.
meanings.sent4: After being torrified in the kiln, the clay became hardened and ready for shaping.
meanings.sent5: The scientist torrified the sample to analyze its chemical composition more accurately.

meanings.definition: Made light and porous through heat treatment.
meanings.sent1: The torrified foam material was perfect for insulation in the house.
meanings.sent2: The torrified popcorn was a hit at the movie night for its fluffy texture.
meanings.sent3: The torrified sponge soaked up the spill quickly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The torrified bread dough rose beautifully in the oven, creating a soft loaf.
meanings.sent5: The torrified volcanic rock was surprisingly lightweight, perfect for construction.
